ttp_template:
<group name="interface_pid_area_state_cost_nbrs">
{{INTERFACE}} {{PID | re("\\d+")}} {{AREA}} {{IP_AD{{STATE | ORPHRASE}}ESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{COST}} DR {{NBRS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
<group name="interface_pid_area_ip_address_cost_state_nbrs">
{{INTERFACE}} {{PID | re("\\d+")}} {{AREA}} {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{COST}} {{STATE | ORPHRASE}} {{NBRS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
textfsm_template:
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value PID (\d+)
Value AREA (\d+)
Value IP_ADDRESS (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\/\d+)
Value COST (\d+)
Value STATE (\S+)
Value NBRS (\d+/\d+)

Start
  ^\s*Interface\s+PID\s+Area\s+IP\s+Address/Mask\s+Cost\s+State\s+Nbrs\s+F/C\s*$$
  ^\s*${INTERFACE}\s+${PID}\s+${AREA}\s+${IP_ADDRESS}\s+${COST}\s+${STATE}\s+${NBRS}\s*$$ -> Record
